subject: Triathlon
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Matt Reed and Julie Swail Ertel earned spots on the United States men’s and women’s triathlon teams with wins in Tuscaloosa, Ala., in the second of three trials. They join Laura Bennett and Jarrod Shoemaker on the team. Andy Potts was second by 20 seconds for the men, and Sarah Haskins Kortuem was 29 seconds behind Ertel.
